column1: Ocean Protocol is a decentralized data exchange. Protocol to make data and services universally available
for applications in AI and beyond.
Ocean Protocol uses blockchain technology that allows data to be shared and consumedin a
safe, secure and transparent manner. Ocean is a decentralized platform and network that
connects providers and consumers of valuable data, while providing open access for
Ocean Protocol facilitates the networkand infrastructure to bring together data providers,
data consumers, and service providers into a marketplace commons. It does not impose
vendor lock-in or extract monopolyrents. The control of the network is decentralizedand
distributed between the Foundation, the network keepers, the developers, the data providers,
